strapiPost.title: SoNA Going Big For Its 2022-23 Season Opener At Walton Arts Center
strapiPost.content:
The Symphony of Northwest Arkansas will launch its biggest season yet on Saturday, Oct 29 at Walton Arts Center, opening its season with Imagine Big, a show reflecting SoNA’s bold vision for orchestra. 

  • Bigger: The performance will include Jessica Meyer’s Go BIG or Go HOME, Dmitri Shostakovich’s Cello Concerto No. 1 featuring cellist Julian Schwarz, and Modest Mussorgsky’s Pictures at an Exhibition.
  • Bolder: Connecting all these works is a spirit of ambition, imagination, and contagious energy that speaks to SoNA’s vibrant future and biggest and boldest season yet.

Tickets and season subscriptions on sale now HERE.
